Name: Dr.-Ing. Peter Börgardts
Date of Birth: 12/03/1961
Marital status: divorced, 2 sons Philip, 25 and Richard, 21
Functions: Key Account Management, Technology Scanning,
Sales management, sales, project planning
Areas of expertise: environmental technology with a focus
Wastewater and exhaust air purification
Experience: 7 years of research and development
23 years in sales, 16 years in a management position
Professional background
06/1996 – Present: Eisenmann Anlagenbau GmbH & Co. KG, Böblingen
International plant engineering company with approx. 3000 employees and a turnover of EUR 700 million in surface, environmental, high temperature and conveyor technology
since 06/2016 – Present: Senior Key Account Manager Environmental Technology
• Further development of the international customer base in the chemical industry
• Sales of exhaust air and wastewater treatment plants
• "Technology scanning" for the Eisenmann environmental technology portfolio
Special success:
EUR 4 million order to build the first regenerative afterburning plant in Hastelloy with a quench / scrubber system for corrosive exhaust air
Opening the list of bidders for Eisenmann and corresponding networking worldwide at: BASF, Bazan, DOW, DSM, INEOS, Lanxess, Bayer, Syngenta
EUR 500,000 engineering order for waste water from a copper melt for a plant volume of over EUR 30 million
Increase the hit rate to over 50%
Identification of innovative processes for digestate and oil sludge
Relocation of the divisional and sales management of the Environmental Technology division to the USA as part of the restructuring program Go!
07/2010 - 05/2016 Head of Sales Environmental Technology
• Head of sales with responsibility for budget and results
• Responsibility for 20 employees and €40M turnover
• 5 departments: exhaust air purification, waste water treatment, recycling of residues, Ammunition disposal and biogas plants
Special success:
Introduction of key account management in the area of ​​environmental technology
Market launch of 3 new products:
High-load digestion for anaerobic sewage sludge treatment
Dry fermentation of organic waste
Biogas treatment with membranes
EUR 30m turnover with 28 biogas plants on the booming biogas market in Italy in 3 years through a representative structure
Establishment of new markets for exhaust air purification in Israel through cooperation partners and in China by building up a separate team
EUR 10 million order for a facility for the disposal of SS24 missiles
30 diploma and master theses and 14 R&D projects
approx. 50 environmental lectures and publications
08/2004 - 06/2010 Head of Department Sales Water
Management of the water / wastewater division worldwide with responsibility for results
Responsible for project planning, sales, development and technology
4 employees, EUR 11 million turnover
Special success:
Sale of the first turnkey sewage system with building to Degussa in Wesseling for phosphate precipitation
Further development of the Fentox process and sale of the first wastewater system to Bayer against the Bavarian Loprox process
7 further Fentox sewage systems sold in the chemical industry
Strategic cooperation with Lanxess and Flottweg in Russia
Sale of a sewage system to Ford St. Petersburg with a building to comply with extremely low limit values ​​and the recovery of oils and surfactants via ultrafiltration / nanofiltation
5 ZLD (Zero Liquid Discharge) systems designed and built in Russia
6 pilot plants for membranes, Fentox and anearobe / aerobic biology
13 diploma / master theses and 6 R&D projects supervised directly
Participation in the largest environmental contract for the delivery of a turnkey chemical weapons disposal facility for EUR 142 million
Construction of the demonstration plant in Knittlingen for anaerobic municipal wastewater treatment with simultaneous production of biogas and fertilizer with Fraunhofer as part of the DEUS 21 research project
20% cost savings through standardization of wastewater treatment plants for automotive projects
4/2000 - 07/2004 Group leader sales exhaust air cleaning
Project planning and technical sales of systems for exhaust air purification
Adsorption,
